snippet:
Ref: 71863 - Application Developer-Cloud FullStack

Dear kumar ,
 
We regret to inform you that after careful consideration, we have decided to pursue other candidates whose application more closely a
body:
Ref: 71863 - Application Developer-Cloud FullStack

Dear kumar ,
 
We regret to inform you that after careful consideration, we have decided to pursue other candidates whose application more closely aligns with the specific requirements of the position. We appreciate the time and effort you invested in the application process.
 
As per our company policies, your application will be kept active in our system for other IBM Recruiters to review for 12 months (or 6 months for residents of Germany and Austria).

We highly encourage you to join our Talent Network, connect with us on Social Media and continue to visit the IBM Careers website. This will ensure that you’re one of the first to see opportunities in the future.

Additionally, I would like to share some free online learning resources that IBM has made available to anyone who may be interested.

Offerings include:
IBM Skills
IBM Skills helps you build critical technology skills for today and stay competitive tomorrow. IBM has made thousands of online courses and badge certifications freely available. This includes offerings IBM has created in partnership with universities from all over the world. You can find more information here - https://skillsbuild.org/

Open P-Tech
Technology and jobs are changing faster than education systems. Open P-Tech, for teachers and students, allows students aged 14-20 to complete coursework on the platform and earn industry recognized “digital badges” that can be added to their resumes and social networks.

We hope that you will take advantage of these offerings for yourself and please feel free to share these resources with your family and friends.

Your interest in IBM is appreciated and we wish you the best in your future endeavors.

Sincerely,
IBM Talent Acquisition Team

snippet:
hi
we are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer Intern at Hiscope Cyberlink Technologies. Please find the official offer letter attached for your review. We look forward to welcoming
body:
hi
we are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer Intern at Hiscope Cyberlink Technologies. Please find the official offer letter attached for your review. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!
best regards

snippet:
Thank you for your interest in the position of Software Engr I - 129737 at Honeywell. We are always interested in considering talented people for career opportunities with our organization. 



We
body:
Thank you for your interest in the position of Software Engr I - 129737 at Honeywell. We are always interested in considering talented people for career opportunities with our organization. 



We will not be pursuing your candidacy for this position, however, we appreciate your considering Honeywell an employer of choice, and hope you continue to apply to jobs matching your interests as they arise.



We encourage you to view other jobs on the Honeywell Careers Website, where you can search for other roles as well as sign up to get job alert notifications about specific positions, locations, and learn more about what it’s like to work with us.



Once again, we thank you for your interest in Honeywell and wish you every success in your career endeavors.



Best regards,



Honeywell Talent Acquisition



The Future Is What We Make It. 



#Futureshaper



Make an Impact. Make Real Connections. Make the Best You.

body:
From: hr@amazon.com
To: candidate@example.com
Subject: Application Update - AWS Engineer Role
Date: Dec 8, 2025

Hi There,

Thank you for your interest in the AWS Engineer position. After careful review of your application, we have decided to move forward with other candidates who more closely match our current needs.

We appreciate your time and wish you success in your job search.

Best regards,
Amazon Recruiting

snippet:
Dear Sandeep,

Thank you for your interest in Thermo Fisher Scientific, the world leader in serving science.

We have successfully received your application for the following position: R-01335005 - Au
body:
Dear Sandeep,

Thank you for your interest in Thermo Fisher Scientific, the world leader in serving science.

We have successfully received your application for the following position: R-01335005 - Automation Engineer . Our Talent Acquisition team will review your qualifications and will be in touch with the next steps.

In the meantime, we encourage you to continue to learn more about us at Careers at Thermo Fisher Scientific, connect with us on social media and explore #LifeAtThermoFisher through the eyes of our 125,000+ global colleagues.

Interested in reviewing your application status? You can check any-time by creating an account with us.

- Click Create Candidate Home Account
- Select "Create Account"
- Create a username and password

If you created an account after submitting your application, you can access your account to sign in and view your application status.

Thank you,

Thermo Fisher Scientific Talent Acquisition Team
*Please do not reply to this email

snippet:
thank you for applying to the role of 67431 - Junior AI Developer with person ID - 10729008 at IBM. We’re excited that you’re considering us as your next employer!

Here at IBM, we believe our greate
body:
thank you for applying to the role of 67431 - Junior AI Developer with person ID - 10729008 at IBM. We’re excited that you’re considering us as your next employer!

Here at IBM, we believe our greatest asset is the IBMer. We strive every day to foster a culture of conscious inclusion for all individuals and provide IBMers the opportunity to make a positive impact on the world while bringing their authentic selves to work.

To that end, we want to be as transparent as possible with you about what to expect next now that you’ve applied to IBM. Currently, your application is being reviewed by real IBMers, who are experts in screening resumes in their respective fields. If there's a potential match, we’ll contact you to discuss the next steps of our hiring process.

While you wait to hear from us:

• Visit our special careers page to find tips on acing your interview and career advice from current IBMers. You can also check out our application process page to learn more about how we hire at IBM.

• Connect with us on our Life@IBM social media channels (links in the footer below) where you can engage with us further, discover what life at IBM is like, and see how IBMers around the world are making an impact.

You can also check the status of your application at any time by visiting your IBM Career Portal . If you have any questions, please feel free to send us a direct message on any of our social channels.

Thank you again, sandeep kumar, for taking the time to apply to IBM and for your interest in becoming a future IBMer.

Best regards,
IBM Talent Acquisition Team

snippet:
B-031225
Powered by HackerRank
This is a timed test. Please make sure you are not interrupted during the test, as the timer cannot be paused once started.
Please ensure you have a stable internet conn
body:
B-031225
Powered by HackerRank
This is a timed test. Please make sure you are not interrupted during the test, as the timer cannot be paused once started.
Please ensure you have a stable internet connection.
We recommend you to try the sample test for a couple of minutes, before taking the main test.
Before taking the test, please go through the FAQs to resolve your queries related to the test or the HackerRank platform.
IBM Person ID is a Unique number that you would get after you register on IBM career portal, or you can find the same when you login to your IBM career portal profile.
How Test Timing Works
Please make sure you can complete this test in one sitting, as the timer cannot be stopped once you begin. Clicking "Agree & Start" starts your running timer, even if you are not actively in the test. Importantly, the timer does not pause if you log out or get disconnected from the assessment.
 
A Few Things to Consider
This is a programming test. Please be prepared to encounter programming/coding challenges during the assessment.
You must submit a response to all questions to be considered completed.
For an optimal experience, ensure you have a stable internet connection, and please complete this test in Mozilla Firefox 101+ or higher or Google Chrome 102+ or higher. Be sure to work in a quiet place where you will not be disturbed and close all applications, pop-up blockers, or other items that may cause a distraction.
We recommend that you try the sample test for a few minutes before taking the actual test. You will need to return to this page to begin the actual test.
To resolve any questions related to the test or the HackerRank platform, please go through these FAQs.
You will have an opportunity to share feedback after submitting the test.
 
 
Test Instructions
If the code area contains the function signature, just complete the function alone, we'll take care of the main function, headers, etc.
In coding questions, you can print to console to debug your code using the appropriate print command for each language (E.g.: cout for C++, printf for C, etc.)
 
Dear Candidate,
Greetings from IBM India!
 
We are pleased to invite you to our Virtual recruitment process . This is an exclusive invite designed for you.
 
Please ensure you check the settings of your system before you start the actual test by clicking this URL https://www.hackerrank.com/statuscheck
 
This is a Proctored test so please ensure your Webcam is working, you can check the same by clicking this URL https://webcamtests.com
 
Please note that we have enabled the AI proctoring features and any detection of the below activities can result in disqualification from further considerations in the hiring process, revocation of an employment offer, or termination of employment with IBM. We ensure an IBM recruiter validates all evidence before final decision making. The activities that can lead to rejections are mentioned below:
 
1.   Shift Tabs/Browsers in between the test.
2.   Copy and paste
3.   Move outside the Webcam
4. Taking assistance/support from any other person during the assessment (if more than one person in the webcam frame)
5.  Running/Using Screen Sharing Apps during the test
 
By beginning this assessment, you agree to complete the assessment with complete honesty and understand the consequences of indulging in unfair practices. IBM strives to maintain the highest standard of business conduct. IBM requires its current and future employees to conduct themselves in an honest and fair manner.
 
At IBM we value your privacy and are committed to protecting and processing your personal information responsibly. As an applicant, to know more about our Talent Acquisition Privacy policy, please visit this link à https://www.ibm.com/employment/talent_acquisition_privacy.html
 
Very Important Note - This Test link will be active for login on 3rd dec 2025 only between 06:30PM to 06:40PM, So you are requested to Click on Start Challenge Link in this mail by 06:15PM and update all your credentials before 06:30PM and Click on Agree and Start to begin with the actual test before 06:40PM.
 
You will not be able to Start the Test from 06:40PM
Please ensure you mention your IBM Person ID correctly.
 
Regards,
 
IBM University Hiring Team

snippet:
Thank you for your interest in Software Development Engineering opportunities at Amazon! We are excited to move you forward to the next step of the application process, the Online Assessment.

Please
body:
Thank you for your interest in Software Development Engineering opportunities at Amazon! We are excited to move you forward to the next step of the application process, the Online Assessment.

Please complete the online assessment (link below) within 7 days of receiving this invitation.

Once you are ready, set aside at least 2 hours of uninterrupted time and follow the link provided below to complete the online assessment. Please note: once you start the online assessment there are limited opportunities to stop and restart; we suggest to click on the link when you are ready to complete the online assessment in its entirety.

Before beginning your online assessment, please review the following instructions and helpful hints:

Do not click the Start My Assessment link below until you're ready to start and complete the assessment.
Please complete the assessment as soon as possible.
Take the assessment in a quiet, distraction-free environment.
Set aside at least 2 hours in a place where you can focus.
Ensure you have a reliable internet connection during the assessment.
Work on a larger screen such as a laptop or desktop computer. This assessment is not mobile-enabled, so you will need to complete it on a desktop computer or laptop.
You can find more information on assessments at Amazon here: https://www.amazon.jobs/en/landing_pages/assessments
If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
After completing the assessment, you can take an optional feedback survey.
You will know you have completed the entire assessment when you see the confirmation page at the end.
To begin your assessment, use the link below:
Start My Assessment
Note: This link is unique to you.

Troubleshooting
For any technical issues, refer to the troubleshooting guides in the assessment. If those do not work, examine closely where you left off, log out, and log back in using the link above. Please do not repeatedly refresh the screen.
If technical issues cannot be resolved, please contact your recruiter immediately.
We recognize this is a large time investment. We value the people we hire and we appreciate your interest in Amazon. You will be contacted in the event we dec

snippet: I have completed the necessary actions to address the issues identified in the verification review, including moving the application homepage and privacy policy to a domain under my ownership and upda
body:
I have completed the necessary actions to address the issues identified in the verification review, including moving the application homepage and privacy policy to a domain under my ownership and updating the URLs in the Cloud Console. The domain has also been verified.

Please proceed with the verification process.

Thank you,

snippet:
Thanks for your interest in joining us as a Data Engineer. In order to get to know you better, we'd like to move forward with the hiring process.

You’re invited to participate in our screening proces
body:
Thanks for your interest in joining us as a Data Engineer. In order to get to know you better, we'd like to move forward with the hiring process.

You’re invited to participate in our screening process!​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
Submit by	Total questions (9)
Dec 10th, 2025 (11:59 PM SAST)
Text, Multiple Choice
Get Started
You’ll be directed to our onboarding page, where you can find additional info.
What to expect?
​​​​​​​
1. You'll answer the questions on your own, without the presence of an interviewer.
2. After you submit your results, our recruiters will review and assess them and be back in touch as quickly as possible.

If you have any questions or need assistance, don’t hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your time and effort. Good luck!
Kind regard,
NTT DATA - Talent Acquisition Team

Connect With Us On

snippet: We are pleased to offer you the position of Senior Software Engineer at Apple...
body:
Dear Candidate,

We are pleased to offer you the position of Senior Software Engineer at Apple. We were impressed by your skills and experience.

Please review the attached offer letter and let us know your decision by next Friday.

Sincerely,
Apple Recruiting Team

snippet: Thank you for your interest in Netflix. After careful consideration...
body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in the Backend Developer role at Netflix. After careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with other candidates whose qualifications better match our current needs.

We appreciate the time you took to apply and wish you the best in your job search.

Best,
Netflix Talent Acquisition

snippet: We would like to invite you to an onsite interview at Tesla...
body:
Hello,

We reviewed your application for the Autopilot Engineer role and would like to invite you to an onsite interview at our Fremont factory.

Please let us know your availability for next week.

Regards,
Tesla Careers

snippet: You have been invited to a Goldman Sachs Coding Challenge...
body:
Dear Applicant,

You have been invited to take the Goldman Sachs Engineering Assessment on HackerRank.

This test will take approximately 90 minutes. Please complete it within 3 days.

Click here to start.

Good luck!

snippet: Thanks for applying to Airbnb. We have received your application...
body:
Hi,

Thanks for applying to the Frontend Engineer position at Airbnb. We have received your application and will review it shortly.

You can check your status on our career portal anytime.

Cheers,
Airbnb Recruiting
